maqras.text: 100|9|kya vah us samay ko nahin jaanata, jab qabron mein jo kuchh hai, nikaal liya jaayega
100|10|aur seenon ke bhed prakaash mein laaye jaayenge
100|11|nishchay unaka paalanahaar us din unase poorn roop se soochit hoga.
101|1|vah khadakhada dene vaalee.
101|2|kya hai vah khadakha dene vaalee
101|3|aur tum kya jaano ki vah khadakhada dene vaalee kya hai
101|4|jis din log, bikhare patingon ke samaan (vyaakool) honge.
101|5|aur parvat, dhunee huee oon ke samaan udenge.
101|6|to jisake palade bhaaree hue
101|7|to vah manachaahe sukh mein hoga.
101|8|tatha jisake palad halke hue
101|9|to usaka sthaan haaviya hai.
101|10|aur tum kya jaano ki vah (haaviya) kya hai
101|11|vah dahaktee aag hai.
102|1|tumhen adhik (dhan) ke lobh ne magan kar diya.
102|2|yahaan tak ki tum qabristaan ja pahunche.
102|3|nishchay tumhen gyaan ho jaayega.
102|4|phir nishchay hee tumhen gyaan ho jaayega.
102|5|vaastav mein, yadi tumhen vishvaas hota (to aisa na karate).
102|6|tum narak ko avashy dekhoge.
102|7|phir use vishvaas kee aankh se dekhoge.
102|8|phir us din tumase sukh sampada ke vishay mein avashy poochh gachh hogee.
103|1|nichadate din kee shapath
103|2|nihsandeh, insaan kshati mein hai.
103|3|atirikt unake, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye evan ek-doosare ko saty ka upadesh tatha dhairy ka upadesh dete rahe.
104|1|vinaash ho us vyakti ka, jo kachoke lagaata rahata hai aur chaute karata rahata hai.
104|2|jisane dhan ekatr kiya aur use gin-gin kar rakha.
104|3|kya vah samajhata hai ki usaka dhan use sansaar mein sada rakhega
104|4|kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. vah avashy hee hautama mein phenka jaayega.
104|5|aur tum kya jaano ki hautama kya hai
104|6|vah allaah kee bhadakaee huee agni hai.
104|7|jo dilon tak ja pahoonchegee.
104|8|vah, usamen band kar diye jaayenge.
104|9|lanbe-lanbe stambhon mein.
105|1|kya tum nahin jaanate ki tere paalanahaar ne haathee vaale ke saath kya kiya
105|2|kya usane unakee chaal ko viphal nahin kar diya
105|3|aur unapar pankshiyon ke dal bheje.
105|4|jo unapar pakee kankaree ke patthar phenk rahe the.
105|5|to unhen aisa kar diya, jaise khaane ka bhoosa.
106|1|quraish ke svabhaav banaane ke kaaran.
106|2|unake jaade tatha garmee kee yaatra ka svabhaav banaane ke kaaran.
106|3|unhen chaahiye ki is ghar (kaaba) ke prabhu kee pooja karen.
106|4|jisane unhen bhookh mein khilaaya tatha dar se nidar kar diya.
107|1|(he nabee!) kya tumane use dekha, jo pratikaar (badale) ke din ko jhuthalaata hai
107|2|yahee vah hai, jo anaath (yateem) ko dhakka deta hai.
107|3|aur gareeb ko bhojan dene par nahin ubhaarata.
107|4|vinaash hai un namaaziyon ke lie
107|5|jo apanee namaaz se achet hain.
107|6|aur jo dikhaave (aadambar) ke lie karate hain.
107|7|tatha maoon (prayog mein aane vaalee maamoolee cheez) bhee maangane se nahin dete.
108|1|(he nabee!) hamane tumhen kausar pradaan kiya hai.
108|2|to tum apane paalanahaar ke lie namaaz padho tatha bali do.
108|3|nihsandeh tumhaara shatru hee be naam nishaan hai.
109|1|(he nabee!) kah doh he kaafiro
109|2|main un (moortiyon) ko nahin poojata, jinhen tum poojate ho.
109|3|aur na tum use poojate ho, jise main poojata hoon.
109|4|aur na main use poojoonga, jise tum poojate ho.
109|5|aur na tum use poojoge, jise main poojata hoon.
109|6|tumhaare lie tamhaara dharm tatha mere lie mera dharm hai.
110|1|(he nabee!) jab allaah kee sahaayata evan vijay aa jaaye.
110|2|aur tum logon ko allaah ke dharm mein dal ke dal pravesh karate dekh lo.
110|3|to apane paalanahaar kee prashansa ke saath usakee pavitrata ka varnan karo aur usase kshama maango, nihsandeh vah bada kshamee hai.
111|1|aboo lahab ke donon haath naash ho gaye aur vah svayan bhee naash ho gaya
111|2|usaka dhan tatha jo usane kamaaya usake kaam nahin aaya.
111|3|vah sheeghr laava phenkatee aag mein jaayega.
111|4|tatha usakee patnee bhee, jo eendhan lie phiratee hai.
111|5|usakee gardan mein moonj kee rassee hogee.
112|1|(he eesh doot!) kah doh allaah akela hai.
112|2|allaah nihchhidr hai.
112|3|na usakee koee santaan hai aur na vah kisee kee santaan hai.
112|4|aur na usake baraabar koee hai.
113|1|(he nabee!) kaho ki main bhor ke paalanahaar kee sharan leta hoon.
113|2|har usakee buraee se, jise usane paida kiya.
113|3|tatha raatri kee buraee se, jab usaka andhera chha jaaye.
113|4|tatha gaanth lagaakar unamen phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se.
113|5|tatha dvesh karane vaale kee buraee se, jab vah dvesh kare.
114|1|(he nabee!) kaho ki main insaanon ke paalanahaar kee sharan mein aata hoon.
114|2|jo saare insaanon ka svaamee hai.
114|3|jo saare insaanon ka poojy hai.
114|4|bhram daalane vaale aur chhup jaane vaale (raakshas) kee buraee se.
114|5|jo logon ke dilon mein bhram daalata rahata hai.
114|6|jo jinnon mein se hai aur manushyon mein se bhee.
